repast.simphony.engine.environment

Interface RunListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataSetManager, BatchRunDataSetManager, BatchRunner, OneRunBatchRunner, ReLogoModel, RSApplication, SingleRunDataSetManager, TimeSeriesComponentControllerAction

    public interface RunListener
    Interface for those classes that want listen for Run events: started, stopped and so on.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    Nick Collier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void paused()
      Invoked when the current run has been paused.
      void restarted()
      Invoked when the current run has been restarted after a pause.
      void started()
      Invoked when the current run has been started.
      void stopped()
      Invoked when the current run has been stopped.
